■ Frozen potatoes are easy to break, so handle them carefully 
 ■ Store potato boxes in the potato freezer 
 and take out the required amount just before 
 use (fries need to be cooked while still frozen)

■ Do not refreeze thawed potatoes 
 ■ All thawed potatoes are discarded 
 when the store closes 
 ■ Potatoes with ice crystals should be discarded
